com.client.Graphics

Class AnimationsOfAnAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.client.Graphics.AnimationsOfAnAction

  • public class AnimationsOfAnAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the "same" animation from different directions (i.e., stores multiple animations of a single action, from different angles).
    Author:
    Ian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationsOfAnAction

        public AnimationsOfAnAction(java.lang.String directory_action,
                    float scalar,
                    int max_executions,
                    boolean fr_cycle)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        directory_action - the directory where the animations' frames can be found.
        scalar - the constant to resize all frames by.
        max_executions - the maximum number of times to draw the animations.
        fr_cycle - whether to cycle the animations forward and backward.

    • Method Detail

      • getResource

        public DrawableResource getResource(Directions direction)
        Gets a resource representing the animation.
        Parameters:
        direction - from this direction.
        Returns:
        the animation, as a DrawableResource.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Whether there are no actions stored.
        Returns:
        if so.
